title: Trendocrinologist 7/28: Wu Tang, Bob Odenkirk, Moron McCarthy, Arthur, Luciana Alvarado, Love is Blind
itunes:title: Trendocrinologist 7/28: Wu Tang, Bob Odenkirk, Moron McCarthy, Arthur, Luciana Alvarado, Love is Blind
description:
Martin Shkreli having his one-of-a-kind Wu Tang album seized and liquidated, Bob Odenkirk collapsing on the set of 'Better Call Saul", Nancy Pelosi calling Sen. McCarthy a 'moron', PBS cancelling 'Arthur' (cuz John Legend, probably), Luciana Alvarado ending her Olympic floor routine with a tribute to BLM, and 'Love is Blind: After The Altar'

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
